job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtPurpose of PositionsltstronggtltpgtltpgtWorks on a team developing testing debugging and supporting new software or enhancements to existing software in support of a very complex business modelampnbspRole includes meeting with customers to understand their business processes and needs with the objective of determining solutions to support the businessampnbspThis will sometimes require filling multiple roles to turn the customers needs into actual solutionsampnbspTakes initiative owns issues from start to finish proactive communicator Daily activities include typical software development activities developing testing debugging supportingltpgtltpgtltstronggtGeneral Tasks and ResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtSoftware analysis activities for new software or enhancements to existing software to include providing high level estimates based on limited information in support of the project governance processltligtltligtSoftware development activities for new software or enhancements to existing softwareltligtltligtSupport of new and existing softwareltligtltligtInteractioncommunication with business users regarding requirements design reviews prototype presentations etc This position may or may not manage employees based on location of incumbentltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtEducationltstronggtltpgtltpgtBachelors in Computer ScienceltpgtltpgtltstronggtCertifications and LicensesltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtYears of Experienceltstronggtltpgtltpgt03 years of experienceltpgtltpgtltstronggtCore CompetenciesltstronggtltpgtltpgtAdaptabilityltpgtltpgtCollaborationltpgtltpgtStrives for Positive ResultsltpgtltpgtServiceOrientedltpgt
